handlers.code:
library.addEventHandlers(library)
library.addEventHandlers(system)
library.addEventHandlers(player)
library.addEventHandlers(construct)
library.addEventHandlers(unit)
library.addEventHandlers(antenna)
library.addEventHandlers(OLS1)
library.addEventHandlers(OLS2)
library.addEventHandlers(OLS3)

local a=vec3(construct.getWorldPosition())local b=vec3(construct.getWorldOrientationForward())local c=vec3(construct.getWorldOrientationRight())local d=vec3(construct.getWorldOrientationUp())local function e(f)return vec3(a+c*f.x+b*f.y+d*f.z)end;local g=e(vec3(OLS1.getPosition()))local h=e(vec3(OLS2.getPosition()))local i=e(vec3(OLS3.getPosition()))local j=string.format([[{"OLS1":[%f,%f,%f], "OLS2":[%f,%f,%f], "OLS3":[%f,%f,%f]}]],g.x,g.y,g.z,h.x,h.y,h.z,i.x,i.y,i.z)antenna.send(22554892,j)unit.exit()
